ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: yes I would recommend it, but I would say it is difficult and the class atmosphere is not open or friendly
Yes, if you have time to work. The papers take a great while to write and the readings were heavy too.

The material in this course is tough, but absolutely essential. The skills I learned in this course for evaluating research design will enhance my own research in the future, and will make me a more discerning, knowledgeable participant in the scientific community.
Absolutely -- I expect to look back on this course for years.
Yes, definitely recommend it! Learned a lot and it will be useful. Dr. Kazdin is a great teacher and very knowledgeable.
Highly recommend-- takes a lot of work but learn a lot about research methods.
I would definitely recommend Psych 541 to other students and would advise that they take it as soon as possible. I only wish I had taken it earlier!

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: the course provided very useful tools and ways of thinking
Prepared me to conduct independent research and be more critical of other's research.
This was probably the most important course I will ever take in the history of my graduate training in psychology. I know I will refer back to my notes and the texts for many years.
